amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to purchase chickens treated with fluoroquinolone.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2130 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2130 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14143) To prohibit the use of funds to purchase chickens treated with fluoroquinolone.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2130 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2130 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Clinton.
